synopsis.text: Yui, a young girl on the brink of womanhood, has successfully secured her place at Oumi Academy and plans to live with her childhood friend, Junpei, and his family. However, her father misinterprets a situation and forbids her from staying with Junpei, leading Yui to run away from home. Junpei, determined to clear up the misunderstanding and ensure Yui's safety, embarks on a mission to find her. This mission leads them to an unexpected adventure on a late-night train and a stay at a love hotel. This side story, initially intended as the TV series finale, fits chronologically between the first and second OVA episodes, offering a deeper dive into the original series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
